dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.StructuralUnit AS Department, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Employee, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Currency, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.RegistrationPeriod, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountExpense, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurTurnover, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Employee.Ind AS Ind, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Employee.EmploymentContractType AS EmploymentContractType, PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers.Employee.Code AS TabNumber FROM AccumulationRegister.Payroll.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, RegisterRecords, ) AS PayrollBalanceAndTurnovers
